createTicketSale((uint256,uint256,uint25.details: This function creates a collection of tickets and a smart contract to sell those tickets

params.sale: A `SaleParams` struct containing parameters for the sale
params.ticket: A `TicketParams` struct containing parameters for the tickets being sold

returns.ticketAddr: The address of the ticket contract associated with the ticket sale
returns.ticketSaleAddr: The address of the newly created ticket sale contract

params.maxSalePeriod: The maximum duration (in seconds) that a ticket sale can last.
params.protocolFee: The fee percentage (in basis points) that the protocol charges on sales
params.protocolFeeRecipient: The address that will receive collected protocol fees
params.ticketImplementation: The address of the ticket implementation contract
params.ticketSaleImplementation: The address of the ticket sale implementation contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

createTicketSale((uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: Creates a new ticket sale with specified sale and ticket parameters

documentation.text: @notice Checks that the address is not zero address

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address,address,uint256,address,struct SaleParams memory,struct TicketParams memory) external returns (address)

documentation.text:
@title TicketFactory contract
 @notice A contract that creates tickets (ERC721 collection) and ticket sales.
 The contract is managed by Owner role.
 The owner can set on a smart contract:
 - maximum sales period
 - protocol fee on ticket sales
 - fee recipient
 - implementation of the TicketSale smart contract
 - implementation of the Ticket smart contract
